title: Matt Hancock – 2021 Speech at the Virtual NHS Confed Conference
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Matt Hancock, the Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, on 17 June 2021.
content:
If I think about the last 18 months, one of the most striking moments for me was a nightshift I did at Basildon hospital in January.
